item.title: QCP Capital: Bitcoin in Range-Bound Action, Dollar Short Squeeze Could Trigger Cryptocurrency Sell-Off Risk
item.description: On July 30th, QCP Capital made a post on its official channel, saying, "Bitcoin is continuously trading within a narrow range and having difficulty effectively breaking through the $120,000 barrier. Meanwhile, the sustained buying pressure near $116,000 continues to offer support. Ethereum's upward momentum also seems to be losing steam as it approaches the psychological barrier of $4,000, and the momentum indicator is gradually shifting to a neutral state. From a structural perspective, the continuous inflow of institutional funds and positive regulatory developments imply that the possibility of hitting a new high in the medium term remains high.However, caution still needs to be exercised. The price movement has shown only a limited response to a series of positive news, such as the United States passing supportive cryptocurrency regulatory measures and positive developments in spot and derivative ETFs. Historically, when the market is flooded with bullish news but the price remai

item.title: August Token Unlocking in the Crypto Market to Decrease to $3 Billion, a 52% Month-over-Month Decrease
item.description: On July 30th, according to Tokenomist's data, the total amount of cryptocurrency expected to be unlocked is projected to decrease significantly to $3 billion in August. This represents a decrease of approximately 52% compared to July's $6.3 billion.The key unlocking projects include: Sui (SUI), Fasttoken (FTN), Aptos (APT), Avalanche (AVAX), and Arbitrum (ARB). Specifically, Sui is scheduled to unlock tokens worth around $167.62 million on August 1st, making it the largest single-token unlocking event this month. Fasttoken will release tokens worth $91.6 million on August 18th. Additionally, Aptos will unlock $51.5 million in tokens, Avalanche will unlock $40.35 million in tokens, and Arbitrum will unlock $39.24 million in tokens.

item.title: Samourai Wallet's two co-founders acknowledge cryptocurrency mixing service-related allegations
item.description: On July 30th, Keonne Rodriguez and William Lonergan Hill, the co-founders of Samourai Wallet, have entered pleas of guilty in the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York to charges associated with their cryptocurrency mixing service.

item.title: OKX CEO Star has published a blog post paying tribute to the tenth anniversary of Ethereum, stating a firm commitment to co-building the future on the blockchain.
item.description: July 30th. In commemoration of Ethereum's tenth anniversary, OKX CEO Star published a blog post titled "Ethereum's Tenth Anniversary: My Personal Tribute," reflecting on the shared journey with Ethereum and looking forward to the future of the blockchain. Star stated that since OKX was established in 2013, they have maintained a close collaboration with the Ethereum ecosystem. In the future, OKX will continue to provide world-class products and services to more than 1 billion users globally, driving the realization of a truly decentralized blockchain vision.In the article, he publicly recounted his first encounter with Vitalik for the first time and admitted that he had underestimated the profound significance of Ethereum's vision. Now, he highly values its ability to reshape the global financial system and trust mechanism. Star pointed out that OKX has long adhered to the open and transparent spirit advocated by Ethereum, from introducing ZK Reserves to supporting EIP-7702 and build

item.title: Yesterday, Hyperliquid's contract trading volume reached $11.14 billion, a daily decrease of 10.2%.
item.description: On July 30th, according to DefiLlama data, the contract trading volume of Hyperliquid reached $11.14 billion on July 29th, showing a daily decrease of 10.2%.According to Coinglass data, the contract position size of Hyperliquid reached $13.862 billion. The Bitcoin contract position size reached $4.381 billion, with a 24-hour increase of 0.76%. The Ethereum contract position size reached $3.83 billion, with a 24-hour decrease of 4.97%.

item.title: Bitget Launchpool Project GAIA is now open for staking, with a maximum lock-up of 50,000 BGB.
item.description: July 30th. Currently, Bitget's Launchpool project Gaia (GAIA) is open for staking. By staking BGB, 3,858,300 GAIA is unlocked. The maximum staking limit for regular users is 5,000 BGB, and for VIP users, it is 50,000 BGB. The staking deadline is August 1st at 17:00 (UTC+8).

item.title: US Stock Crypto Reserve Concept Stock Pre-market Mixed, 'BNB Edition Micro Strategy' VAPE Down 6.05%
item.description: On July 30th, based on the market data from Rockflow, the pre-market trading of US cryptocurrency reserve concept stocks presented mixed results. The following are the Ethereum reserve concept stocks:SharpLink Gaming (SBET.US) increased by 1.57%;BTCS Inc (BTCS.US) decreased by 1.39%;Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR.US) rose by 3.5%;GameSquare (GAME.US) went up by 1.97%;Bit Digital (BTBT.US) increased by 0.68%.For the BNB reserve concept stocks:CEA Industries (VAPE) dropped by 6.05%;Windtree (WINT) declined by 4.16%.

item.title: 「Silent 14.5-Year Holder of 3963 BTC Ancient Whale」 transferred an additional 50 BTC half an hour ago
item.description: On July 30th, according to the on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the "ancient whale that had been holding 3,963 BTC in silence for 14.5 years" transferred an additional 50 BTC ($5.91 million) to the address bc1q8...kxayr half an hour ago. The current ownership of the receiving address remains unknown.

item.title: Gate has launched perpetual contract trading for A2Z and UNITE.
item.description: On July 30th, according to official channels, Gate has initiated A2Z perpetual contract trading (settled in USDT), with support for 1-20x leverage; and it will launch UNITE perpetual contract spot trading (settled in USDT) at 18:10 on July 30th (UTC+8), also providing support for 1-20x leverage.

item.title: Institutional Ethereum Whale Holdings Change in the Last 30 Days: BMNR Holds 625,000 ETH Ranking First
item.description: On July 30th, based on strategicethreserve data, the following treasury companies and institutions witnessed significant changes in their Ethereum holdings over the past 30 days:Bitmine Immersion Tech (BMNR) took the lead, currently holding 625,000 ETH, which is approximately worth $23.8 billion, with a 283.1% increase in holdings during the past 30 days;SharpLink Gaming (SBET) ranked second, currently holding 438,200 ETH, approximately worth $16.7 billion, and experiencing a 132.49% increase in holdings over the past 30 days;The Ethereum Foundation ranked third, holding 238,500 ETH, approximately worth $8.977 billion, with a 6.69% decrease in holdings over the past 30 days;Bit Digital (BTBT) ranked seventh, holding 120,300 ETH, approximately worth $4.585 billion, and showing a 335.53% increase in holdings over the past 30 days;BTCS Inc (BTCS) ranked tenth, holding 70,000 ETH, approximately worth $2.669 billion, with a 379.64% increase in holdings over the past 30 days.
